firstParagraph.text:
Hello 👋 As said above I am a
frontend developer. I worked
as a print designer after my
studies, but I quickly found
that it was missing some
interactions, so I started to
develop.

secondParagraph.text:
Now I really like to code
animations, transitions and
interactions with a fresh and
cool design. Pizzaiolo in my free
time, I’m looking for the best
homemade pizzas but what I like
most is to eat them. 🍕

like.likeTitle:
Now that we’ve seen
what I’ve done,
let’s see together
what I’d like to do / learn
like.contactText:
so if you can help me make
these things happen, Please
feel free to drop me a line
